definition: made according to the specifications of an individual, accepted or habitual practice
details:
adjective
- made according to the specifications of an individual
= synonyms: custom-made
noun
- accepted or habitual practice
= synonyms: usage
- habitual patronage
= example: habitual patronage
- a specific practice of long standing
= synonyms: tradition
- money collected under a tariff
= synonyms: impost, customs, customs duty
